DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetic drug interaction safety Candesartan free combination Candesartan Amlodipine Candesartan monotherapy .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer 20 45 year age ( inclusive ) prestudy ( screen ) . 2 . Volunteer 19kg/m² ≤ BMI ( Body Mass Index ) ≤ 26kg/m² 3 . When volunteer screening , Must include item . 1 . 100 mmHg ≤ sit SBP < 140 mmHg 2 . 60 mmHg ≤ sit DBP < 90 mmHg 3 . 45 bpm ≤ Pulse < 95 bpm 4 . Those decide join clinical trial comply precaution write consent . 1 . A previous history present clinically significant liver , renal , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , musculoskeletal , endocrine , neuropsychiatric , hematooncological , cardiovascular disease . 2 . Have gastrointestinal disease history affect drug absorption ( Crohn 's disease , Ulcers , GERD , Gastritis , etc . ) surgery ( except simple appendectomy hernia surgery ) . 3 . The history clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction Investigational drug food . 4 . The history drug abuse drug abuse show positive urine drug test . 5 . Taking drug receive investigational drug within 90 day prior first dose metabolize enzyme inducer inhibitor barbital within 30 day prior first dosing . 6 . Whole blood donation within 60 day prior first dose plasma donation within 30 day prior first dosing . 7 . Taking drug clinical trial expect affect within 14days take food contain caffeine , grapefruit within 7days first dosing . 8 . A heavy alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 3cup/day 3times/week within last 1month ) 9 . A heavy smoker ( cigarette > 10cigarettes/day ) 10 . The subject positive result serum test ( Hepatitis B , C , HIV Test , Syphilis ) . 11 . Have Liver enzyme level ( AST , ALT ) Bilirubin , total result great 1.5 time UNL . 12 . Have result Creatinine clearance less 80mL/min ( CockcroftGault equation applicable ) . 13 . The result 12lead ECG screen test QTc > 450msec . 14 . An impossible one participant clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result another reason .
